title: Nick & Mike Play Doki Doki Literature Club For The First Time!
description: The team at Kinda Funny have hyped this game up and Blessing has gone on record saying this is one of his favorite games of all time! So Nick and Mike have agreed to check it out and give it a try under one condition. THEY MUST GO IN KNOWING NOTHING ABOUT THE GAME. So here we are part one of their playthrough. Thank you to Joey and Tam for joining them and bringing the incredible voice acting.
